answers.answer: Is your Hashimotos being treated? If your thyroid is acting up, it will throw off the rest of the body. Add to that the stress of being ill. . .  Sounds like it's time to check in with your doctor.

question: Hi, recently experienced the flu with 101 fever and bronchitis, I have lupus, diabetes type1 along with hashimotos and vitiligo. My blood pressure dropped to 84/48 while at supermarket, suger was 200.symptoms  were foggyheaded and lightheaded. One week later it happened again. whats going on can anyone help. thanks!!!
title: low bp
